title: Sore ga Seiyuu! (Seiyu's Life!)
synopsis: Dreaming of becoming a top-tier professional in the fast-paced, competitive world of voice acting, rookie Futaba Ichinose frantically scurries around, searching for auditions and performance sessions. Rubbing elbows with some of the biggest names in the industry, she tries to find her own unique voice and style.
related_anime: ['Sore ga Seiyuu!', 'Sore ga Seiyuu!: Petit Uchiage']
